name: Calx
description:
Distract yourself while training your mental arithmetic abilities.
Find simple math equations like 1 + 1 = 2 and 123 / 3 = 41 to get points.

Sounds too easy?
Just play on! It soon becomes challenging as you must think faster and faster. The quicker you calculate the more points you earn. Can you reach a highscore?

Features

  • A new addictive twist on classic match3 gameplay mechanics.
  • Beautiful color effects.
  • Dynamic disco-style music. But you can also turn it off while listening your own music.
  • iOS version scored 8 / 10 Points by BrutalGamer: http://brutalgamer.com/2011/10/10/calx-ios-review/
  • Now ad-free. Pay what you feel like.
